body_html:
hello

it seems that the test requires a GPU, because it creates a GPU target, and does some work with it. i can't remember why it fails to run, except that it does.

it appears to require the GPU to build (because it requires the GPU device). this drags in a lot of CUDA stuff.

if I can find some spare time then I will remove the changes from our code base and see why it is failing.

body:
hello

it seems that the test requires a GPU, because it creates a GPU target, and does some work with it.  i can't remember why it fails to run, except that it does.

it appears to require the GPU to build (because it requires the GPU device).  this drags in a lot of CUDA stuff.

if I can find some spare time then I will remove the changes from our code base and see why it is failing.
